page_content:
SFW Ltd

Collaboration Platform Microsoft SharePoint

SFW’s SharePoint Collaboration Platform makes working together and sharing information effective and efficient. A secure IL3 private cloud or public cloud service, typical team working patterns are supported via engaging and customisable templates. Available as a per-user monthly subscription (SaaS), the platform provides an organisational multi-lingual collaboration hub.

Features

  • Central portal with intuitive, integrated content and navigation
  • Project collaboration for public sector projects by virtual teams
  • Team collaboration for long-running teamwork aligned with organisational Functions
  • Breakout collaboration for simple, short-term workspaces
  • Knowledge sharing communities for domain experts to share Insights
  • Option for SharePoint Online using Office365
  • Usage reports to help monitor uptake
  • Configurable Forms and Workflow, Integrated and powerful search
  • Secure IL3 Private Cloud or Official/Office-Sensitive accredited (Office 365)
  • Easy to use, multi-lingual content editing and publishing

Benefits

  • Deliver efficiencies and savings by collaborating effectively
  • Reduce travel costs by collaborating in the cloud
  • Based on an industry standard platform for easy migration options
  • Accessibility: users can access service from securely connected mobile devices
  • Cost effective flexibility: easy to add/remove users and features
  • Security Compliant: Meets Cloud Security Principles for Official/Official-Sensitive Content
  • Self-sufficiency: rollout methodology includes skills transfer

Pricing

£2.00 per user per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
